summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3683 , for the improvement of North 70th Street, as established by Ordinance No. 42799, from Fremont Avenue to Greenwood Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45384 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
